article.title: FLIR Systems Receives $96.6 Million Contract for Starfire III Sensors
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: FLIR Systems Incorporated has received a $96.6 million firm-fixed-price contract for Starfire III sensors and related cables and hardware for the rapid aerostat initial deployment (RAID) sensor components. The U.S. Army Space and Missile Defense Command, Huntsville, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
